entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mildred Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
